attributes.action: security guard in bromley to be given brave award
attributes.additional_details:
security guard in bromley who stopped and restrained a man who had a machete till police arrived to receive a bravery award
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-london-35183580
attributes.background: security guard in bromley who stopped and restrained a man who had a machete till police arrived to receive a bravery award

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
